description: Describes the license configurations for the specified resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a resource that has an associated license configuration.

nested_items.name: LicenseSpecifications
nested_items.description: License configurations associated with a resource.

nested_items.name: LicenseConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the license configuration.

nested_items.name: AmiAssociationScope
nested_items.description: Scope of AMI associations. The possible value is cross-account.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Token for the next set of results.
